markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon's Rage Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=162) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 92 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[dragon instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You sprout dragon wings from your back of the same color as your chosen dragon. While you are raging, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. If you are flying when your rage ends, you start to fall but the transformation only completes at the last moment, so you take no damage from the fall and land standing up.

<title level="2">Dragon's Rage Wings leads to...</title>
[Dragon Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=172)
name: Dragon's Rage Wings
